document_data.name: Garret
document_data.home:
[[Graveyard (Mere of Dead Men)|Unnamed graveyard]],
[[Mere of Dead Men]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Garret''' was a [[human]] soldier of [[Fort Locke]] near the [[Mere of Dead Men]] on the [[Sword Coast North]].
document_data.History: Garret was one of Fort Locke's soldiers that went with [[Tann]] and his men to patrol. However, they were captured by the [[Unnamed shadow priest|shadow priest]]. Unlike others, Garret was killed by the undead.
